output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate - Also mentions Gabriel Ghilea for Senate position
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - Posted on Facebook/Instagram as a paid advertisement - Uses inclusive language ("toți românii") - Targets a large estimated audience (100,001-500,000 people)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly calls for votes ("Pe 24 noiembrie, votați Marcel Ciolacu") - Uses campaign slogans ("pentru un viitor sigur") - Clear electoral messaging with party identification (PSD)
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains direct call to action for voting - Uses campaign slogans and party messaging
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official campaign communication with CMF number - Paid advertisement from "Infomed Pro SRL" - Structured as campaign messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct call to vote for specific candidates - Paid advertisement targeting large audience - Clear campaign messaging and slogans - Promotes both presidential and parliamentary candidates
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral explicit pentru candidatul prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea cu ID-ul 862107419116899 conține îndemnuri directe de vot ("votați Marcel Ciolacu pentru un viitor sigur") și a fost difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încetarea propagandei electorale. Mesajul are caracter electoral evident, fiind marcat cu CMF 11240017, și vizează influențarea directă a votului pentru alegerile prezidențiale.
